title: Hot Shot Hero
description: ChloeFinding an empty foil packet in my husband’s jeans wouldn’t have been surprising—if we’d actually used those in the last decade.I gave up everything for him and in return, he betrayed me in the worst way.Sliding down a stripper pole five nights a week isn’t exactly my dream job.But I did it.For him.With my life in shambles, I have to find the strength to start again.RhysThe very last thing I need is a distraction in the form of a feisty, curvaceous stripper.When her version of a lap dance catches more than just my attention—I have to see where she leads me. It can’t be forever.But whatever it is—I’ll take it.For now.
author: Jessa York
